metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13616 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 1.2.15 and 2.x through 2.0.9 has a heap-based buffer over-read in BlitNtoN in video/SDL_blit_N.c when called from SDL_SoftBlit in video/SDL_blit.c. USN-4238-1 addressed serveral vulnerabilities in SDL_image. This update provides the corresponding fixes for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.

criterions.comment: libsdl1.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libsdl2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libsdl2-image: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
sdl-image1.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
